creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is an open-source Lightning first Bitcoin Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* EXPERIMENTAL: Added WebLN browser. 🔥 (can be activated in settings)
* Changed chain sync work to be triggered every 4th hour instead of 6th.
* Bug fixes and improvements

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is an open-source Lightning first Bitcoin Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Tor support 🔥🔥🔥
Blixt Wallet now supports connecting to and opening channels with Lightning nodes via Tor.
Both connecting to nodes using onion services and normal IP addresses are supported.
Try it out in Settings -> Experiments
IMPORTANT: Some features in Blixt Wallet will still expose your IP address, even if you enable Tor (more info in app when activating Tor).
* Addressed a regression where app start would be slow on some devices

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is an open-source Lightning first Bitcoin Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Fixed an issue where startup time would occasionally be very high
* Fixed Google Drive backup not working correctly
* Enabled amount-less invoices -- there's no need to set an invoice amount anymore
* Upgraded to lnd v0.11.0-beta.rc1

Previous Version:
* Tor support 🔥

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Screen transitions! 🔥 The app now features screen transitions, providing a better experience
* In-app calculator when creating an invoice! 🔥 This can be useful for splitting bills etc
* Added transaction icon for lnurl-pay chat
* Added the ability to cancel an invoice
* Fixed a bug where paying Bitrefill in the WebLN browser would not work
* Fixed a bug where creating an invoice after re-entering the app could cause duplicate instances in the transaction log

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Blixt is back!

* The app now properly use the IBM Plex font which is a part of Blixt's theme profile
* Upgraded lnd to 0.12.0
* Added the ability to set a custom note to a transaction
* Added LndMobileHelpCenter for tracking down lnd-related bugs (Reached from Settings)
* Fixed a bug where the Bitcoin amount in the payment confirmation screen could be erroneous
* Support for LNURL fallback scheme
* Added the ability to generate P2SH address by long pressing the "Generate bitcoin address" button

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added the ability connect to a custom Bitcoin Node for chain syncing (BIP157)
* Added Lightning Peer List to see the currently connected peers (Settings -> Show Lightning Peers)
* Added the ability to connect to a Lightning Peer
* Removed Google Play Services requirement (Google Drive backup will not work without Google Play services)

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* The default Bitcoin node that Blixt connects to has been changed to node.blixtwallet.com. This should solve any syncing issues that you may have encountered
* The wallet now better handles operating system font size increases
* Updated lnd to v0.12.1-beta
* Added Payment Hash to Transaction Details

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Fixed a bug where on-chain transactions wouldn't get published
* Fix parsing bitcoin address when bitcoin: protocol is in uppercase
* Minor improvements and tweaks

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* BREAKING CHANGE: Changed LNURL-auth implementation to be standard compliant
* Fixed a bug where Tor integration would make the app fail to start under certain circumstances
* WebLN browser is now enabled by default for all new wallets
* Autopilot will now only open channels towards Blixt's official lightning node
* The app now targets Android SDK 30

title: Blixt Wallet

descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed a bug regarding automatic channel openings
- Added the ability to manually set fee rate when withdrawing on-chain funds

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Updated to lnd 0.13.0

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Updated lnd to 0.13.1
* Fixed copy to working in lnd log view
* Waiting for lightning network graph sync is no longer required before paying (can be enabled in Settings)

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added the ability to send to Lightning Addresses. 🔥
Lightning Address is a new way of paying on Lightning.
By using an email-like format, there's no need for QR-codes anymore.
Learn more about this on https://lightningaddress.com.
Find the option in Settings. Receiving support for Blixt Wallet users is in planning stages right now.
* Added support for bitcoin address BIP21 ?lightning fallback scheme
* Added support for non-bech32 LNURL codes (LUD-17)
* Minor bug fixes

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* App Drawer 🔥
The app now features an app drawer, containing common wallet functionality
* Lightning Contacts & Services 🔥
A new Contact list has been added for Lightning Addresses and LNURL codes
Find it in the app drawer add all your friends!
* LNURL-pay payments now retain their description within the transaction log
* Modal blur effect has been removed
* Fixed a bug where on-chain transactions weren't broadcasted properly

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.

Find it in the app drawer add all your friends!

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Work around connectivity issues for users with channels with the Blixt LSP Node
* Added the Keysend Experiment to the app drawer
* You can now send a chat message together with the Keysend payment!
* Improved the pay dialog for LNURL-pay
* Added the ability to send name together with a comment for LNURL-pay
* Mitigate scheduled sync work issues
* Removed "Send to Lightning Address" from Settings, find it in the drawer instead
* LNURL spec compliance fixes
* Minor improvements and bug fixes

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Fixed an issue where errors wouldn't be displayed when attempting to pay an invoice
* Increased the payment fee limit from 50 sats to 2500 sats
* Changed the trigger for pad layout, more pads should now use the pad layout instead

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Updated lnd to 0.13.3 to address Lightning vulnerabilities (CVE-2021-41591/ CVE-2021-41592 / CVE-2021-41593)
* Implemented LNURL-pay extension LUD-18, a protocol for sending payer name and other information together with the payment
* Updated to react-native 0.66.0
* Minor fixes

title: Blixt Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: * Minor fixes

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Updated lnd to v0.14.0-beta.rc2
This version contains an important fix for the Neutrino client in preparation for the Taproot activation
* Added the ability to get node information by node ID (find it in Settings)
* Fixed a bug where an error returned on the Keysend experiment would crash the app

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy New Year!
This marks the first Blixt Wallet release of 2022.

* Updated lnd to 0.14.1-beta
* When restoring a wallet, recovery info is now displayed on the Chain sync modal
* Available on-chain balance is now displayed on Withdrawal and Open Channel screens
* A notice has been added to the Overview screen when a channel is being opened
* Exporting lnd log now lets you choose where to put the file
* App now targets Android SDK 31

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update contains a hotfix for Android 12. 0.4.0 follows:

Happy New Year!
This marks the first Blixt Wallet release of 2022.

* Updated lnd to 0.14.1-beta
* When restoring a wallet, recovery info is now displayed on the Chain sync modal
* Available on-chain balance is now displayed on Withdrawal and Open Channel screens
* A notice has been added to the Overview screen when a channel is being opened
* Exporting lnd log now lets you choose where to put the file
* App now targets Android SDK 31

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added the ability to do a wallet rescan
* Dunder LSP now works with LNURL-withdraw
* Added support for blixtwallet: deeplinking
* Exporting channel backup now lets you choose where to put the file
* Fixed a bug where some payments would fail if a name was set in settings
* Fixed a bug where Keysend Experiment would say that a payment succeeded when it actually failed
* Fixed a bug where LNURL-withdraw would fail because comma was used for decimal separation instead of period

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Fixed a bug where app would fail to start because of an lnd configuration error
* Added a status indicator to the Drawer
Red: Wallet is starting up
Orange: Waiting for channels to come online
Green: Wallet is ready
* Updated lnd to v0.14.2-beta
* Fixed a bug where LNURL-withdraw would permanently freeze

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This is an important hotfix release.

* Updated lnd to v0.15.2-beta in order to fix a bug where Blixt Wallet would not successfully sync the chain under certain conditions.

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to Blixt Wallet 0.6.0.

- Updated to lnd 0.15.4. This includes an important sync fix
- Added translations for 9 new languages! Dutch, French, German, Klingon, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish and Vietnamese
- Added `sats` as a Bitcoin unit. Newly created will use the `sats` unit by default
- Added support to receive by Taproot (P2TR)
- Added support for channel "alias scid" feature enabling more private channels. These channels are tagged by an "alias scid" text in the channel list

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Fixed a bug regarding the fee calculation causing the max limit to be 10 satoshi
* Fixed a bug where Multi-Path Payments would still be enabled even if the setting is disabled
* All wallets, including already created ones, now default to Multi-Path Payments being enabled by default

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* The app has been translated to Croatian!
* Updated lnd to v0.15.5
* Lnd's strict graph db channel pruning config is now disabled by default
* It's now possible to see the payment duration for an invoice paid using Blixt. Tap a transaction in the transaction log to view
* Added "Show Network Info" to the Lightning Network category in Settings. This modal lets you see information about the Lightning Network

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added the ability to restore with passphrase (25th word)
* Add the ability to change language on the welcome screen
* Fixed notifications not working on Android 13
* Fixed a bug where the "Force close" button would appear when restoring channels via SCB
* Fixed QR code not working for Keysend Experiment
* Fixed camera not working for Keysend Experiment

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added the ability to set maximum LN fee for a payment, proportional to the amount
* Added the ability to change lnd log level
* Fixed a bug where a paid amount-less invoice would show up as 0

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Updated lnd to v0.16
* Added support for bimodal pathfinding (based on Pickhardt payments). Enabled it in Settings!
* Added the ability to set a label for a contact in the contact list
* Sats amount on Overview screen is now grouped
* Lowered the scheduled sync job interval from 4h to 2h

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Updated lnd to v0.16.2
* Added fee estimation for Lightning payments
* Added the ability to use all available onchain funds when manually opening a channel
* Added the ability to create a wallet with a passphrase (25h word)
* Merged app GUI and lnd to the same process, this should help with app stability

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a self-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Blixt Wallet is back, and we have an important new feature called Speedloader!

Speedloader syncs wallet's channel database ("channel graph") on startup. This is important for payment pathfinding and will make sure you have an up-to-date db.

* Added the ability to periodically sync Lightning channels (via Speedloader). Find the setting in the Experiments category.
* Added basic hodl invoice support.
* Added 0-conf channel support.
* Fixed restore via channel backup file not working correctly

title: Blixt Wallet

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a self-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Blixt Wallet is back with version 0.6.9. Nice!

This release has a lot of goodies, such as Simple Taproot Channels support, 0-conf channels for Dunder LSP, new robust Tor implementation and support for a bunch of new languages.
With the new Persistent Mode you can keep Blixt Wallet running all the time in the background.

Read the whole changelog on our GitHub:
https://github.com/hsjoberg/blixt-wallet/releases/tag/v0.6.9

title:
Blixt Wallet
0.6.9

creator: Hampus Sjöberg
descriptionHtml: Blixt Wallet is a self-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android with focus on usability and user experience, powered by lnd and Neutrino SPV.
descriptionShort: Blixt Wallet open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added Lightning Box support!
Lightning Box is a Lightning Address provider, giving you an address to receive from. This works in conjunction with Persistent Mode.
Register your Lightning Box account from left menu -> Advanced -> Lightning Box
* Fixed a crash on Android 14 when Persistent Mode and Tor is used together.
* Fixed Speedloader server setting not working
* Fixed Enable Speedloader checkbox not functioning correctly
* Receiving on-chain via Taproot is now enabled by default.

title:
Blixt Wallet
0.6.9-420
